channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves...
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: AeroPilates Home Studio
channel.desc: Experience a unique and relaxing way to strengthen and tone your every muscle. This method is much-loved by celebrities and is now being brought to you.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Doll10 Beauty
channel.desc: the pioneer in age reversal beauty and a combination of breakthrough technologies, age transforming complexes and real life make-up techniques.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves with Dyson Haircare
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love, featuring Dyson's high-tech Supersonic Hairdryer.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beautys Best Finds
channel.desc: Up your beauty game with our best finds in the industry, from favourite formulas to the latest releases. Whether you want to shake up your make-up or step up your skincare, find it here.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Judith Williams Ageless Icons
channel.desc: Judith Williams Ageless Icons.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Supersize Your Beauty
channel.desc: Buy in bulk and enjoy great value for money with this fantastic selection of supersized beauty products from a range of different brands.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Alison Young
channel.desc: Join Alison Young in this beauty show and discover how to introduce peptides into your skincare ritual. Explore a range of luxe formulas from some top brands.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Shark Haircare
channel.desc: Discover the Shark Style iQ Hair Dryer & Styler, a fantastic hair tool that will have you creating your favourite bouncy, sleek, straight and curled hair looks at home.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Estee Lauder
channel.desc: Founded in 1946 by Est?e Lauder, the company that bears her name has a worldwide reputation for producing innovative skincare, make-up and fragrance of the finest quality. Join us as we take a look.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Alison Young's Beauty Fix
channel.desc: Alison Young's Beauty Fix.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Shay & Blue Boutique Fragrance
channel.desc: Established in 2012, Shay & Blue is an award-winning boutique perfumery based in London's Marylebone that brings a contemporary twist to artisan fragrance.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Gift of Good Skin
channel.desc: Enjoy the gift of good skin with a little help from the Naturally Active Skincare range from Liz Earle - designed to cleanse, hydrate and protect skin all year round.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Percy and Reed Haircare
channel.desc: Percy and Reed brings you new haircare products you always needed but could never find and they only create products which work - bringing British individuality and their own style to your hair.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Margaret Dabbs London
channel.desc: Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Last Chance Beauty Offers
channel.desc: There's still time to shop our great beauty offers, so take a look at great make-up collections, indulgent bodycare, premium skincare and more to upgrade your stash for the new year.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves...
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Shark Haircare
channel.desc: Discover the Shark Style iQ Hair Dryer & Styler, a fantastic hair tool that will have you creating your favourite bouncy, sleek, straight and curled hair looks at home.
